metadata.description: With a dangerous alien weapon in the hands of Norwegian Warlord, the rightful ruler of Norway must rely on two young warriors to prevent a civil war.  Twin sisters Bren and Bera, who have been trained from birth by famed Berserker Skullsplitter,  lead a hand-picked war party  on mission to find the source of the alien weapon and ultimately bring an end to the thread of the tyrant Warlord Braxon.
metadata.name: Twin Blades
